actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to enable the United States to render assistance to or in behalf of certain migrants and refugees.

summary.text: Migration and Refugee Assistance Act - Authorizes appropriations of such amounts as may be necessary: (1) for assistance to Cambodian and Vietnamese refugees in the United States; (2) for assistance to State or local public agencies providing services for substantial numbers of such refugees; (3) for transportation to, and resettlement in, other areas of the United States of such refugees; and (4) for establishment and maintenance of projects for refresher professional training of refugees.

titles.title: A bill to enable the United States to render assistance to or in behalf of certain migrants and refugees.
